name: Add new Jira issues to Notion databases
description:
Use this template to automatically add new JIRA Cloud Platform issues to a Notion database.

The template setup assumes you have created Notion databases for each of your Jira projects. Use unique names that include the names of the projects in Jira. See this Notion [database](https://www.notion.so/7158fe1e46044766a996fe31c3316df6?v=2d314e3694b64be7bc4ab5fb2d03393b) for reference.
